Home.Description: Welcome to LFMReviews! Share and read reviews about your teachers to improve the educational quality of your community.

FAQ.R1: LFMReviews is a website where you can write and read community reviews about different teachers in various grades and subjects at LFM.
FAQ.R2: Most teachers from 6th grade to Terminale are available. However, you can help us expand our list by sending us information about a teacher we haven't listed yet through the 'Add a Teacher' tab.
FAQ.Q3: Can people know who posted the review?
FAQ.R3: No, all reviews are anonymous, and no one will know who posted them. We ask for your email address only for database purposes and to prevent multiple account creation.
FAQ.Q4: Can people know who posted the review?
FAQ.R4: No, all reviews are anonymous, and no one will know who posted them. We ask for your email address only for database purposes and to prevent multiple account creation.

cookies.title: Cookies:
cookies.description: We use third parties, who analyze site traffic, and deliver personalized content. For more details, please see our Cookie Policy ({{cookiePolicyUrl}}).

cookie_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_policy.intro: LFMReviews uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can control their use.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and track your browsing behavior.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies:
advertising.description: Used by advertisers to deliver personalized ads based on your interests.

advertising.title: Advertising:
advertising.description: To deliver relevant ads and measure their effectiveness.

section4.title: 4. Managing Cookies
section4.description: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our website.

section5.title: 5. Contact Us
section5.description: For any questions regarding this Cookie Policy, please contact us at {{email}}.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.description: Welcome to LFMReviews ({{url}}), a platform where students can log in, create reviews about their teachers, and interact with reviews posted by others. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms of Service.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.description: When posting reviews and interacting with the platform, you agree to:

rules.respect: Treat teachers with respect. Avoid using harmful, offensive, or disrespectful language.
rules.no_inappropriate: Do not post any content that is sexually explicit, aggressive, or otherwise inappropriate.
rules.laws: Adhere to all applicable laws and guidelines when using the site.

section2.consequences: Failure to follow these guidelines may result in the suspension or termination of your account.

section3.title: 3. Account Creation
section3.description: To participate, you must create an account using a valid email address or social login (Google). You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

section4.title: 4. No Payments
section4.description: Our service is free to use. There are no payments required for any features on this platform.

section5.title: 5. Content Ownership
section5.description: Any content you post on LFMReviews belongs to you. We do not claim ownership of your reviews or comments. However, by posting content, you grant us a non-exclusive license to display it on our platform.

section6.title: 6. Account Termination
section6.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account if you violate our user responsibilities or for any other reason, at our discretion, without prior notice.

section7.title: 7. Dispute Resolution
section7.description: In the event of a dispute arising from or in connection with these Terms or your use of LFMReviews, you agree to first contact us directly at {{email}} to seek an informal resolution. If we are unable to resolve the dispute amicably, the matter will be referred to and resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the Spanish Arbitration Court, except where prohibited by law.

section8.title: 8. Changes to the Terms
section8.description: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you via email. Continued use of the service after such changes implies your acceptance of the revised terms.

section9.title: 9. Governing Law
section9.description: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain. Any legal proceedings related to these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Spain.

section10.title: 10. Contact Us
section10.description: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at {{email}}.
